attributes.action: Allow Tul Bahadur Pun VC to settle in Britain and receive medical treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 84-year old Tul Bahadur Pun, earned his VC in Burma on June 23, 1944, when he single-handedly stormed Japanese machine-gun positions during the Second World War.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
